metadata.synopsis: The player can hear rats' squeaks and hisses coming from the bottom of the Shar Temple. This is meant to lure the player to the bottom of the temple.At this point the player has killed multiple rats and refused to negotiate with them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the Ultimatum state during the Last Justiciar quest. Can be done with 'oe SHA_LastJusticiar_SetState_Ultimatum'
